remarks: The coset of the closure of the identity is the closure of a point. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 22-Sep-2015.)
statement:
snclseqg.x $e |- X = ( Base ` G ) $.
snclseqg.j $e |- J = ( TopOpen ` G ) $.
snclseqg.z $e |- .0. = ( 0g ` G ) $.
snclseqg.r $e |- .~ = ( G ~QG S ) $.
snclseqg.s $e |- S = ( ( cls ` J ) ` { .0. } ) $.
snclseqg $p |- ( ( G e. TopGrp /\ A e. X ) -> [ A ] .~ = ( ( cls ` J ) ` { A } ) ) $.
